message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it's only fair to present it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece worth $12000 at a significantly reduced rate. We hope you find this offer compelling.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is quite limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While I understand your current budget constraints, I'd like to make a counteroffer that might better suit your needs. I am willing to offer the product at $9000. This is still below its market value of $12000, providing you with a good savings while ensuring we cover our costs. I hope this revised offer is more agreeable.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to counter with $8500 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns more closely with your valuation while staying within my budget.

I see you've made a genuine effort to find common ground, Bob. In light of your latest proposal, I am prepared to consider $8750 as a final offer for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions, allowing you to acquire the item at a significant discount while still covering our expenses. I hope this offer meets your expectations and enables us to reach an agreement.
